item.title: Jusa Lok (Stat)
item.description: Jusa Lok CR 7 Lawful Good Medium Humanoid (Human) Initiative +2; Senses Perception +3 Defense AC 18, touch 12, flat-footed 16 (+6 Armor, +2 Dex, 0 Size) hp 56 (7d8 + 21) Fort +8 Ref +4 Will +10, +1 against traps Defensive Abilities Offense Speed ground 30 ft Space 5 ft, Reach 5 ft Melee Morningstar +6 (1d8 + 1 B & P) Ranged +1 Blackwood Composite Longbow +7 (110 ft, 1d8 + 2 P, x3)
